[/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”70%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right”]Meet our happy clients and read what they say about our brand AA Group.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”-100px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”26.9688px|0px|43px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|||” column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Saad Ali” job_title=”Founder” company_name=”Diginautix” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/24231858_1682195411825391_8365154571469582335_n.jpg” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”3.2″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”100px|||” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)”]AA Group always delivers beyond our expectation. The creativity along with the deadline is what these teams meet up Everytime. For stellar websites and Kick-Ass social media presence please chose team AA Group for spreading your digital footprints in an effective manner.


[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Salman Rajput ” job_title=”Head of Marketing” company_name=”Digital Mahout” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Sanjay-Bhatt-Copy.jpg” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”3.17.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”50px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)”]AA Group team is committed to delivering value. Ganga and team have worked on one of my projects and I am really happy to see their dedication towards successful completion of the project. He has an eye for details and is a subject matter expert. Would love to work with you again.


[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_testimonial author=”Prince Panchal” job_title=”CEO” company_name=”Maayo Home Services” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/WhatsApp-Image-2018-10-11-at-8.30.10-PM.jpeg” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”3.17.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”50px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)”]AA Group has been an important force for guiding our digital marketing. They act as an extension of our team, proactively coming to us with ideas and fixing issues as they arise. They’re exactly what we look for in partners.


[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Chris Campbell” job_title=”Head of Media & Entertainment” company_name=”SmartBeings” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/chris.jpg” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”3.17″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”100px|||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”50px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)”]AA Group is a trusted partner whom we selected after thorough evaluation against other development companies. The team is efficient, creative and has an amazing customer relationship management.I would recommend anyone to AA Group.


[/et_pb_testimonial][et_pb_testimonial author=”Piyush Verma” job_title=”Trustee ” company_name=”Portraits of Patriots™” portrait_url=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/piyush.jpg” quote_icon_color=”#2b87da” _builder_version=”4.5.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#29c4a9″ background_color_gradient_end=”#2b87da” background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”100px|||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”50px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” hover_enabled=”0″ box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”18px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(43,135,218,0.38)”]

We like to thank AA Group for his great understanding of work and full service to us. AA Group is a great company and we are really happy to meet them on the internet. One more time thanks again and wishing you success in your further work.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”custom_footer” _builder_version=”4.5.0″ background_color=”#8e8e8e” custom_padding=”0px|0|0||false|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”211746″ collapsed=”off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ column_padding_mobile=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”42px||0||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://AA Group.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/logo-2-1.jpg” url=”http://www.AA Group.com” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.5.0″ max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”|155px||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” src__hover_enabled=”on|hover”]
